title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ben Leber on Cousins/Zimmer Rift, NFC North Race, O’Connell Expectations
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ben Leber on Cousins/Zimmer Rift, NFC North Race, O’Connell Expectations
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why Kirby Smart is wrong about NIL money ruining the motivation of young athletes. 

Then, former Vikings linebacker and current analyst Ben Leber joins Colin to discuss his recent viral comments reporting a rift between Kirk Cousins and former Vikings Head Coach Mike Zimmer (8:00), if Minnesota should be favored over Aaron Rodgers and the Packers in the NFC North (14:00), why the franchise hasn’t been able to win a Super Bowl (22:00), the impact of Brett Favre on the ‘09 team (27:00), why playing QB in Green Bay is unique to anything else in the NFL (35:00), and how the Vikings will look different under new head coach Kevin O’Connell (40:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
